name: Basic Gorillas
description:
This is a clone of the famous Qbasic GORILLAS.BAS game, written for the DragonRuby Game Toolkit. This is 380 lines of Ruby, and a handful of PNG files.

Type numbers on your keyboard and press enter to throw an explosive banana. Take turns with a friend!

If you're on a machine with a keyboard, you can play the HTML build of this game right on this page. Otherwise, you can download it for several different platforms below!

(Artwork for Basic Gorillas created by Nick Culbertson. Thanks!)
